title: The Second Derivative and Concavity
text: If $$\operatorname{f''}\left(x\right)>0$$ over interval I, then f is concave up over I.\nIf $$\operatorname{f''}\left(x\right)<0$$ over interval I, then f is concave down over I.

title: Concavity and f
text: As the plane lands, it slows down. If the plane decreases in altitude at a decreasing rate, is it concave up or down?
